articles.title: Kim Jong Un Inspects April 22 Thaechon Pig Farm of KPA Air and Anti-Air Force
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Inspects April 22 Thaechon Pig Farm of KPA Air and Anti-Air Force
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un visited the April 22 Thaechon Pig Farm of the Air and Anti-Air Force of the Korean People's Army.
					 Going round various places of the farm, he learned in detail about its construction, management and operation.
					
					 Noting a combined production system was well established to conduct management activities on the basis of comprehensive analysis and appraisal of management information, backed by real-time monitoring and automatic control of all production processes, he said that the production processes have been put on a high scientific, IT and automated basis.
					
					 Patriotism was displayed while building the farm to secure a big proportion of locally available equipment, which helps take great pride in ours and have confidence that we can be well off by doing our own way, he said, praising the KPA for taking the lead in implementing the Party policy on realizing domestic production.
					
					 He set forth tasks facing the farm.
					
					 Praising the farm as an icon stockbreeding base of the country, he expressed great satisfaction over the construction of another supply base conducive to improving the diet of the KPA pilots.
					
					 He highly praised the commanding officers and soldiers of the KPA Air and Anti-Air Force for successfully building an icon farm of the new century as intended by the Party.
					
					 After expressing expectation and belief that the officials and employees of the farm would produce and supply more pork and processed pork to the pilots, he had a photo taken with them.
					
					 Accompanying him were KPA Vice Marshal Hwang Pyong So, director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, Army General So Hong Chan, first vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces, Colonel General of the KPA Air and Anti-Air Force Kim Kwang Hyok, commander of the KPA Air and Anti-Air Force, and Colonel General of the KPA Air and Anti-Air Force Son Chol Ju, commissar of the KPA Air and Anti-Air Force.

articles.title: Korean Youths Will Wipe out Aggressors: Youth League Spokesman
articles.content:
Korean Youths Will Wipe out Aggressors: Youth League Spokesman
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Central Committee of the Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist Youth League in a statement Sunday declared the will of the Korean youths to resolutely and mercilessly wipe out the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet warmongers.
					 Upon hearing the news that the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet group of traitors are making desperate efforts to hurt the dignity of the DPRK and bring down its socialist system while openly talking about "preemptive attack", five-million youth vanguard of the DPRK are hardening their will to wipe out the enemies with the surging rages at them, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The Paektusan large contingents of young people are now waiting for the final order of the headquarters of the revolution, keeping themselves fully combat-ready to mercilessly wipe out with five million nuclear bombs the group of devils who are trying to bring a nuclear disaster to the inviolable country.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists should know that the earth will break if invincible nuclear force and the five million large contingents of young people equipped with nuclear bombs vent their wrath. 
					
					 If the enemies show a slight provocation, we youth vanguard, detached force of the Supreme Commander and unit of stalwart fighters for accomplishing the cause of the Juche revolution, will liberate south Korea at a go and wipe out all the strongholds of the empire of evils beyond the Pacific, like a charge of dynamite set off, like lightning and storm of Mt Paektu in the van of the confrontation with the U.S. and the sacred war for national reunification.
					
					 The world will clearly witness how the Paektusan large contingents of young people will annihilate all aggressors and provokers on the earth and display fireworks of the final victory.

articles.title: Equatorial Guinean President on Kim Il Sung's Feats
articles.content:
Equatorial Guinean President on Kim Il Sung's Feats
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- Tong Chol Ho, DPRK ambassador to Equatorial Guinea, presented his credentials to President Obiang Nguema Mbasogo on April 20.
					 Noting that the relationship between the two countries has a history of nearly 5 decades, the president said:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung rendered sincere help to Equatorial Guinea when it was undergoing difficulties.
					
					 The two countries have strengthened solidarity with each other in the struggle to defend sovereignty and achieve territorial integrity.
					
					 Today's international situation is very complicated.
					
					 Equatorial Guinea will stand by the DPRK in the future, too, as it supported the Korean people in building a powerful country in the past.
					
					 We hope that the DPRK with advanced technology and experience will continue to help Equatorial Guinea in its development.
					
					 Equatorial Guinea will never forget the DPRK which rendered active support and encouragement to the African countries in their struggle for independence, sovereignty and development, and will always remain a close friend of the DPRK.

articles.title: Delegation of Federation of Koreans in U.S. Departs
articles.content:
Delegation of Federation of Koreans in U.S. Departs
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Federation of Koreans in the U.S. left here on Saturday after visiting the homeland on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 Leaving earlier were delegations of the United Confederation of Koreans in Kyrgyzstan, the United Confederation of Koreans in Kamchatka Territory of Russia and the Society for Cooperation among Koreans in Germany.

articles.title: Foreigners Pay Homage to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Foreigners Pay Homage to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- Naguib Sawiris, executive chairman of the Orascom Telecom Media and Technology Holdings SAE of Egypt, and other foreign guests visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun Sunday to pay homage to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					 They entered the halls where the great leaders lie in state and paid tribute to them.
					
					 They went round the halls where orders the great leaders received are on display and the halls that house cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by the great leaders for field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: Floral Basket and Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Floral Basket and Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket and a congratulatory letter from the military attaches corps here on the occasion of the 85th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army.
					 The floral basket and letter were conveyed to Army General Pak Yong Sik, minister of the People's Armed Forces, by Roman O. Jimenez Ortega, military attache of the Cuban embassy, on Sunday.

articles.title: Reception Given to Mark 85th Birthday of KPA
articles.content:
Reception Given to Mark 85th Birthday of KPA
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- The Ministry of the People's Armed Forces of the DPRK hosted a reception on Sunday to mark the 85th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 Present there on invitation were members of the military attaches' corps and foreign diplomatic envoys here.
					
					 Army General Pak Yong Sik, minister of the People's Armed Forces, and Ryom Chol Song, O Kum Chol and other KPA generals and commanding officers.

articles.title: Women's Union Members Present Light Aircraft to KPA
articles.content:
Women's Union Members Present Light Aircraft to KPA
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- A ceremony of presenting light aircraft Nyomaeng (Women's Union) took place on Sunday to mark the 85th anniversary of the founding of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 Among those present were Choe Ryong Hae and officials concerned, servicepersons and members of the Socialist Women's Union of Korea (SWUK).
					
					 Chairwoman of the SWUK Central Committee Jang Chun Sill made a presentation address.
					
					 She said that the light aircraft reflects the patriotic mind and will of all the women's union members to contribute to beefing up the country's defence capability.
					
					 She called upon the women's union members to make their children actively join in the military service and give sincere assistance to the army by steadily inheriting the tradition of assisting the army displayed on Paektu and the spirit of assisting the army displayed by women of Namgang Village in the 1950s.
					
					 A presentation certificate was handed to an official of the KPA General Staff.

articles.title: KPA Is Strong Pillar Supporting Great Cause of Mt Paektu: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
KPA Is Strong Pillar Supporting Great Cause of Mt Paektu: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- The Korean People's Army is the most reliable and perfect army of the leader and the Party as it has defended and supported the cause of the Party with arms, says Rodong Sinmun in an article on Sunday.
					 The article goes on:
					
					 Our army has upheld the cause of the leader in the van since its foundation.
					
					 As they were faithful to their leader the revolutionary armed forces could win a victory after another in every battle to wipe out the Japanese imperialists and achieve the historic cause of liberating the country by arousing all the people to the anti-Japanese war.
					
					 The noble spirit of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army and its tradition of emerging ever-victorious, created in the forests of Mt Paektu, have been invariably inherited through generations.
					
					 Our army played a vanguard role in accomplishing the cause of party and state building in the period of building a new country, united firmly behind the leader, displayed matchless bravery and popular heroism in defeating the U.S. imperialists during the fierce Fatherland Liberation War and fully demonstrated the might of the main force in building a socialist state, independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in defence, on the ruins.
					
					 When big-power chauvinists blocked the Korean revolution and the anti-party and anti-revolutionary factional elements challenged the Party and when the country made an arduous march, the army remained a strong pillar of encouragement and will to the Party and the leader and instilled the faith in certain victory into the people.
					
					 The KPA, which has carried forward only the lineage of Paektu, defended the Party and the leader with arms and took the lead in supporting the idea and leadership of the Party at the turn when the generation of the revolution was replaced.
					
					 The KPA has always emerged victorious, upholding the cause of the Party and the leader with strong faith and pure conscience generation after generation and century after century.

articles.title: Final Doom Waits U.S.: Minju Joson
articles.content:
Final Doom Waits U.S.: Minju Joson
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is pushing the regional situation to the extreme phase after introducing huge nuclear strategic assets and armed forces into the Korean peninsula to realize its criminal ambition to bring down the DPRK by force, says Minju Joson Sunday in a commentary.
					 According to military sources available, the U.S. plans to hurl several nuclear carrier task forces including Carl Vinson and Nimitz into the operational theatre of the Korean peninsula around April 25, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 The army of the DPRK already declared it will deal merciless destructive blows at the enemies so that they would not come back to life again should they make reckless provocation.
					
					 If our Juche weapons with potentials unimaginable by the U.S. open fire, they will destroy the U.S. forces and their stooges to the last man so that there would not be left even a single man who will sign the surrender document. The group of aggressors can never evade our nuclear strike whether they are on the peninsula, at military aggression bases in Pacific or in the U.S. mainland across the ocean.
					
					 It will be useless to regret after taking a single step wrong and bringing ruin to oneself.
					
					 The U.S. Trump administration had better behave with discretion, bearing in mind that its fiasco will bring tremendous consequences incomparable with the political failure met by the preceding administrations.

articles.title: U.S., S. Korean Forces Hell-bent on Joint Air War Exercises
articles.content:
U.S., S. Korean Forces Hell-bent on Joint Air War Exercises
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialist aggression troops and the south Korean puppet air force have been reportedly staging a large-scale joint air military exercises in south Korea from April 14.
					 Involved in the war gambling are more than 100 warplanes including fighters, transports and AWACS belonging to the 7th Air Force Command, navy and marines of the U.S. and the south Korean Air Force Operational Command.
					
					 The exercises, the mission of which is to mount a precision strike at the DPRK, are reported to continue until April 28.

articles.title: One More Archive on Sexual Slavery Found
articles.content:
One More Archive on Sexual Slavery Found
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- Yonhap News of south Korea on April 17 reported that another archive was found in Japan to prove the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					 According to a document submitted by the national archives in Tokyo of Japan to the Cabinet office, the former special police commander of the Japanese navy in Indonesia told an official of Japan's Ministry of Justice after the war that some 200 women were taken to Bali as comfort women on the order of the military.
					
					 In this regard, academicians and civic organizations of Japan criticized the Abe government for sticking to the wrong stand on the sexual slavery.

articles.title: Chongryon Kumgang Insurance Company Marks Its 40th Birthday
articles.content:
Chongryon Kumgang Insurance Company Marks Its 40th Birthday
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held in Tokyo on April 18 to mark the 40th foundation anniversary of the Kumgang Insurance Company under the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					 Present there were Chairman Ho Jong Man and vice-chairpersons O Min Hak and Kang Chu Ryon of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee, Jang Pyong Thae, rector of Korean University, Director General Kim Jung Hwan and members of the insurance company and officials of Chongryon.
					
					 Ho Jong Man made a congratulatory speech.
					
					 He said that 40 years of the company is a history of wise guidance and warm care shown by President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The insurance company has conducted various kinds of campaign for Koreans in Japan in a unique manner even under the harsh economic conditions, he noted.
					
					 Director General Kim Jung Hwan said in a report on the work of the company that it has ranked itself among the authoritative ones by establishing its bases across Japan and conducting brisk activities among Korean residents in Japan.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was read out at the meeting.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised By Foreign Personages
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised By Foreign Personages
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- Personages of different countries made public statements and articles in celebration of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 G. Debarajan, secretary of the Central Committee of the All-India Forward Bloc, said that Kim Il Sung after embarking on the road of the revolutionary struggle in his early years, beat back the Japanese imperialists to liberate Korea and built a socialist state, adding:
					
					 He built Korea into a country strong in independence by applying the Juche idea to the revolution and construction and made great contributions to the cause of global independence.
					
					 He will always be with us and his exploits for the Korean and world's revolution will shine forever.
					
					 Marwan Sudah, chairman of the Jordanian preparatory committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu, said the world doesn't know such a prominent great person as the President.
					
					 The President rallied the Korean people as one and built socialism centered on the popular masses with his gifted ideo-theoretical wisdom, scientific acumen, firm faith and distinguished leadership, he stressed.
					
					 An Algerian writer, in his article, praised the undying feats of the President who rendered material and moral assistance to the Algerian people's struggle for national liberation and building a new society out of his noble internationalist sense of duty.

articles.title: Meetings Held Abroad to Celebrate Day of Sun
articles.content:
Meetings Held Abroad to Celebrate Day of Sun
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- Meetings were held in Cuba, Laos, Myanmar and South Africa on April 6-11 to celebrate the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Present there were personages of various strata and popular masses of those countries and the ambassadors and staff members of DPRK embassies.
					
					 The chairperson of the Cuban Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification noted that Fidel Castro Ruz and Kim Il Sung wisely led the struggle against the U.S. imperialists, common enemy of the two countries, and strengthened the bilateral friendship.
					
					 Saying that Kim Il Sung had led the socialist cause in the DPRK to victory, the chairperson declared that they would strive to further develop the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries and conduct vigorous solidarity activities for support to Korea's reunification.
					
					 A vice-chairman of the C.C., National Construction Front of Laos said that Kim Il Sung is a great leader who liberated Korea and built the first people's country in the East and a close friend who rendered material and moral assistance to the struggle of the Lao people.
					
					 A vice-chairman of the Yangon Regional Executive Committee of the Myanmar's National League for Democracy said that the President is always remembered by the progressive humankind as he performed gigantic feats for the cause of global independence.
					
					 A congratulatory message to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting in South Africa.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced by Romanian Party
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced by Romanian Party
 Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us March Forward Dynamically towards Final Victory, Holding Higher the Banner of Songun" was posted by the Socialist Party of Romania on its website on April 6 to mark the Day of the Sun.
					 The work is a speech the Supreme Leader delivered at the military parade in celebration of the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung on April 15, Juche 101 (2012).
					
					 It clarifies that the century-long history of Kim Il Sung's nation clearly proved the immutable truth that outstanding leader guarantees the dignity and prosperity of the country and the nation.
					
					 It also indicates the tasks for glorifying the dignity of Songun Korea for all ages and successfully carrying out the cause of building a socialist power.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un visita la Planta Porcina 22 de Abril de Thaechon
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un visita la Planta Porcina 22 de Abril de Thaechon
Pyongyang, 23 de abril (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un visito la Planta Porcina 22 de Abril de Thaechon de las fuerzas aereas y antiaereas del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					Recorriendo varios lugares de la fabrica, el Maximo Dirigente se cercioro en detalles del estado de la construccion y la administracion.
					
					Dijo que han asentado bien el sistema de produccion integral, segun el cual se pueden realizar las actividades administrativas al analizar y evaluar todas las informaciones administrativas vigilando en tiempo real y autocontrolando todos los procesos de produccion. Y agrego que son perfectas la cientifizacion, la informatizacion y la automatizacion de las cadenas productivas.
					
					Elogio el patriotismo de los constructores diciendo que la fabrica esta equipada con las instalaciones hechas con las propias fuerzas y anadio que esto difunde el orgullo de los nuestros y la confianza en que podemos vivir felizmente con las manos propias.
					
					Subrayo que el EPC tomo delantera tambien en la materializacion de la orientacion del partido en materia de asegurar los equipos con los recursos nacionales. 
					
					Indico las tareas que se presentan ante la fabrica.
					
					Destaco que la planta constituye un ejemplar de la base ganadera del pais y mostro gran satisfaccion por haber levantado otra base de abastecimiento a ser contribuida a la mejora de vida alimentaria de los pilotos.
					
					Evaluo las proezas de los oficiales y los soldados de las fuerzas aereas y antiaereas del EPC quienes edificaron la planta segun la demanda de nuevo siglo, materializando la voluntad del partido.
					
					Tras expresar la esperanza y la conviccion de que los funcionarios y los empleados de la fabrica enviaran mucho mas carnes crudas y procesadas a los aviadores, se fotografio junto a ellos.
					
					Le acompanaron el vicemariscal del EPC Hwang Pyong So, jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, el general de ejercito de las fuerzas terrestres, So Hong Chan, primer viceministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, el coronel general de las fuerzas aereas, Kim Kwang Hyok, comandante de las fuerzas aereas y antiaereas del EPC y el coronel general de las fuerzas aereas, Son Chol Ju, comisario politico del mismo tipo de ejercito.
